lines.transliteration: x x x x x x+x-šu-ma IGI.2 še-pi-tu ŠU.SI ta-ra-ṣu

lines.transliteration: x x x x x x x-li li-ir-di-šu {d}AG DUMU.UŠ ṣi-ru o

lines.transliteration: x x x x x x+x gal-le-e lem-nu-ti la i-gam-mi-la nap-šat-su
